content: That’s great to hear Shruthi Vijayakumar. Live the Dream program looks wonderful. I have to say, i’m regularly blown away with all of the awesome thing going on in NZ! I’d love to hear more and start a deeper discussion with you, but i’m literally just about to embark on a 2-3 months break/holiday that’s going to involve a lot summertime adventuring and digital downtime. So is it cool if we chat more next year? And Sam Rye… i haven't forgotten about responding to your article. I half wrote a response and its coming… i’ll finish it when feeling inspired sitting on a beach somewhere this summer. All the best -)
